price: Tí wọ́n bá rí apá kan nínú sánmọ̀ tó ya lúlẹ̀, wọ́n á wí pé: “Ẹ̀ṣújò rẹgẹdẹ ni (wọn kò níí gbàgbọ́).”
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina al-samāi sāqiṭan yaqūlū saḥābun markūmun
